info.title: Pocket Network
info.description: This is the API definition Pocket Network core RPC calls. Pocket is a distributed network that relays data requests and responses to and from any blockchain system. Pocket verifies all relayed data and proportionally rewards the participating nodes with native cryptographic tokens.

PortalID.description: Found after registering an app with the Pocket Portal.

schema.title: Response Param V1 Query Param Post

client_pub_key.title: Client Pub Key
client_pub_key.description: Application hex public key associated with a client

address.title: Address
address.description: The hex address of the application

public_key.title: Public Key
public_key.description: The hex public key of the application

jailed.title: Jailed
jailed.description: Has the application been jailed from staked status

staked_tokens.title: Staked Tokens
staked_tokens.description: How many tokens has this node staked in uPOKT

unstaking_time.title: Unstaking Time
unstaking_time.description: If unstaking, the minimum time for the validator to complete unstaking

app_stake_minimum.title: App Stake Minimum
app_stake_minimum.description: minimum amount needed to stake as an application

base_relays_per_pokt.title: Base Relays Per Pokt
base_relays_per_pokt.description: base relays per POKT coin staked

stability_adjustment.title: Stability Adjustment
stability_adjustment.description: the stability adjustment from the governance

participation_rate_on.title: Participation Rate On
participation_rate_on.description: the participation rate affects the amount minted based on staked ratio

address.title: Address
address.description: The hex address of the validator

jailed.title: Jailed
jailed.description: Has the validator been jailed from staked status

tokens.title: Tokens
tokens.description: How many tokens has this node staked in uPOKT

unstaking_time.title: Unstaking Time
unstaking_time.description: If unstaking, the minimum time for the validator to complete unstaking

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of transactions per page. Max of 1000

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of transactions per page. Max of 1000

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of transactions per page. Max of 1000

per_page.title: Per Page
per_page.description: Number of transactions per page. Max of 1000

node_staked.title: Node Staked
node_staked.description: Amount staked by the node in uPOKT

app_staked.title: App Staked
app_staked.description: Amount staked by the app in uPOKT

app_public_key.title: App Public Key
app_public_key.description: Application hex public key associated with a client

address.title: Address
address.description: operator address of the signing info

index_offset.title: Index Offset
index_offset.description: The counter for the signing info (reset to 0 after SignedBlocksWindow elapses)

jailed_blocks_counter.title: Jailed Blocks Counter
jailed_blocks_counter.description: The number of blocks jailed (reset to 0 after unjail)

jailed_until.title: Jailed Until
jailed_until.description: The time the node can be unjailed

missed_blocks_counter.title: Missed Blocks Counter
missed_blocks_counter.description: The number of blocks missed within SignedBlocksWindow (can be decremented after the fact if new signature information/evidence is found)

start_height.title: Start Height
start_height.description: The origin height of the node (when it first joined the network)

recipient.title: Recipient
recipient.description: The receiver of the transaction, will be null if no receiver

message_type.title: Message Type
message_type.description: The type of the transaction, can be "app_stake", "app_begin_unstake", "stake_validator", "begin_unstake_validator", "unjail_validator", "send", "upgrade", "change_param", "dao_tranfer", "claim", or "proof"
